name: Tunga
tagline: Build remote teams of skilled software developers
description:
Tunga connects African software developers directly to international software tasks. Unlike traditional freelancer marketplaces, Tunga is built as a social network. On the one hand, companies can create a following of developers and on the other hand, developers can become friends and work collaboratively. We allow companies to have instant access to the coding skills they need.
Tungaâ€™s ambition is to create a structural and substantial amount of fees for talented youths from Africa in a fair and transparent way.
Tunga is an initiative of the Butterfly Works Foundation and supported by among others Mobbr, DOEN Foundation, Dioraphte, Edukans, Triodos Bank and Trust Law.
